tool_description: API to retrieve recipes used with shobr.
name: shobr-recipes
title: shobr-recipes

api_list.name: GetRecipe
api_list.description: Gets the details for a specific recipe.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call on the API.

required_parameters.name: RecipeId
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to get data for.

optional_parameters.name: Servings
optional_parameters.description: Number of servings. Use "0" to obtain default servings used when this recipe was created.

api_list.name: GetRecipesByFreeText
api_list.description: Gets a list of recipes. Max number of recipes returned is limited to 50.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The text to search for in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call on the API.

api_list.name: GetRecipesInCategory
api_list.description: Gets the recipes for a specific category.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call on the API.

required_parameters.name: MealCatId
required_parameters.description: The id of the category to get the recipes for.

required_parameters.name: PageIndex
required_parameters.description: The page to retrieve from the server.

required_parameters.name: PageSize
required_parameters.description: The number of recipes per page.

api_list.name: GetCategories
api_list.description: Gets a list of all categories.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call on the API.

api_list.name: GetDefaultSupplierMappingByRecipe
api_list.description: Gets a list of products that if purchased matches the ingredients attached to the recipe.

required_parameters.name: DepartmentId
required_parameters.description: If the supplier has multiple departments for delivering groceries, this will identify the department.

required_parameters.name: SupplierId
required_parameters.description: The supplier to get the mapping for. This is only an option if the system you build should be connected to an online supermarket.

required_parameters.name: SupplierPriceConfiguration
required_parameters.description: The products to display for this recipe if multiple products have been attached to each ingredient. Possible values at the moment are: DefaultSelection = 0, CheapestPossible = 1, Organic = 2.

required_parameters.name: RecipeId
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe to get the mapping for.

required_parameters.name: Servings
required_parameters.description: The amount of servings to calculate product mappings for. If 0, we use recipe default.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call on the API.

api_list.name: GetRecipesAll
api_list.description: Extract all recipes from the back end.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The name of the method to call on the API.

required_parameters.name: ApiToken
required_parameters.description: A private token used to verify request on this API method.

optional_parameters.name: textformat
optional_parameters.description:
Defines if text should be formatted as html. html = "full html version", htmlsimple = "only
is preserved" all other html tags are stripped. Default is plain text.
